flagshipProductHome.title: 4Life Transfer Factor
flagshipProductHome.decription: 4Life’s best-selling immune system product! 4Life® Transfer Factor Plus® Tri-Factor® Formula combines the power of Tri-Factor® Formula with a proprietary super-mushroom blend (shiitake, maitake, agaricus, and cordyceps) and zinc to help your immune system more effectively recognize, respond to, and remember potential health threats

step1.title: 1.Select the product you want:
step1.description1: Browse our products in our online store. Use the search bar in the section
step1.description1end: to find what you are looking for. Read the detailed descriptions and review the images to make sure the product is right for you and click on the product.

step2.title: 2.Add it to your cart:
step2.description: Click the 'Add to cart' Can continue shopping and adding more products to your cart before  proceed to purchase.

step3.title: 3.Make your purchase:
step3.description: Enter your shipping and payment information. Choose from the different payment options available. Once you have completed your order, you will receive a confirmation email with the details of your purchase.

step4.title: 4.Recibe tu compra:
step4.description: That's all! Your order will be processed and shipped as soon as possible.

aboutMe.title: About me
aboutMe.description: Hello, I'm Virginia, an authorized 4Life distributor. I am committed to the mission of improving people's overall health and well-being. I am passionate about helping my clients achieve a better state of health through scientifically developed and highest quality products.

contactMe.title: Contact me!
contactMe.descriptionBold: Do you want to improve your well-being?
contactMe.description: explore a new income opportunity and achieve your financial freedom. Write to me to give you all the information.

info.description: This page is created to give greater visibility to 4LIFE products as an authorized distributor of the brand.
